channel.title: Featured on jacks portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Featured on jacks portfolio

item.title: AngelShot
item.description: Making sketchy situations & quick escapes more safe with realistic AI phone calls. Grand Prize - Third Place winner at WildHacks 2024.

item.title: Intervallic
item.description: A video game for music students designed to reduce burnout and make practice fun. Now available on Steam!

item.title: VastWaste & Mind The Debris
item.description: A VR based art installation showcasing the detrimental effects of space and marine debris. Featured at ISEA2022, SIGGRAPH, and Piksel Festival!

item.title: WedBars
item.description: A version of the Hypixel server’s popular Bedwars gamemode, recreated from scratch.

item.title: Northwestern Minecraft Server
item.description: A multi-year Minecraft survival server tailored for the Northwestern community.

item.title: The Abbey: A Fallout 2 Mod
item.description: A mod that attempts to recreate cut content from Fallout 2. Based heavily on the book A Cancticle for Leibowitz by Walter M. Miller Jr.
